title: Online Shopping
description: adaを通貨のように使って大量導入しなければなりません。

f6_assessments.q0: This is an idea, not a concrete proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: No plan has been presented no and relevant experience to deliver the product.
f6_assessments.q2: As there are no deliverables or timelines, there is nothing that can be audited. No KPI's or goals have been set.

f6_assessments.q0: While this proposal brings up an interesting problem, it does not provide a valid solution. It also addresses several different aspects in their solution - one of which is "delivery options" which is not something that the blockchain could utilize, but that is something the retailers would have to facilitate and the usecase for ADA would be more so about payment options. However, without relevant solutions this proposal does only give a problem statement that could be part of a future challenge so that solutions could add value in this field.
f6_assessments.q1:
I do not think that "shopper" is a relevant experience for utilizing a blockchain solution for payment options and onramp solutions. Additionally, important information on deliverables is missing as well as a team, roadmap, financial allocation of funds, milestones, utilization of the blockchain, of ADA, of smart contracts, of applications and strategic retail or financial institutions to partner with. Here are some more aspects to consider if the proposer chooses to develop this idea for a future fund:
Number/growth of application output
Number/growth of application transactions
Total volume of Ada involved in application transactions
Total/growth of resource usage by applications
Number/growth of distinct addresses mentioned in application transactions. Implementation is highly unlikely.
f6_assessments.q2: No. To audit the proposer has to add measures of success, roadmap/milestones and especially - how would transactions be handled, what risks should be considered.... and so on. At the moment, this idea is not auditable and cannot considered for funding.

f6_assessments.q0: - It addresses the challenge because it might provide great value to the cardano environment, however this is quite embryonic and there is not much information about how it gonna deliver its value. Besides, there is no key metrics and the goals are not well stated.
f6_assessments.q1:
- you're not providing any info about how are you planing to achieve your goal, neither saying that you're capable of deliver nor hire someone to build the platform.
- I really think that this brochure must be worked with because the idea is good. However, it's only an idea yet.
f6_assessments.q2: -Since it's only an idea, there is nothing to audit: No budget details, roadmap, timetable, milestones, metrics, etc.

f6_assessments.q0:
Draft proposal.

There is no clarity on the problem and an indication of the relationship with the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
Draft proposal.

There is not enough information to assess feasibility.
I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
Draft proposal.

There is not enough information to assess auditability.
I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: It could be a good proposal if it would be a serious proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: No previous experience, no team specifications and no clues of how it would be implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: Lack of information, lack of KPIs, lack of detailed plan.

f6_assessments.q0: I think this proposal is a misunderstanding. IMO the person just wanted to give an idea to the community without actually doing anything which is OK but that's not the medium to use. I'd suggest going to the discord or telegram channels for that.
f6_assessments.q1: No relevant experience was given. The person is a shopper but doesn't seem to have any ability to follow through with the implementation of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: No information was given at all besides the requested sum for the proposal, so nothing to go on there.

f6_assessments.q0:
I think I am competent to assess this proposal as I am an active member of the Cardano community and I have 7 years of experience delivering software projects as a QA. 
The problem statement is completely unrelated to the challenge. The solution and implementation plan are incoherent, vague and again, unrelated to this challenge.
Due to these reasons and the fact that I can see no metrics for success mentioned anywhere, I strongly disagree this proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
For the proposal to receive a higher score, it would have to identify a problem pertaining to the challenge and a solution to match.
f6_assessments.q1:
I do not think this proposal has any chance of being implemented successfully. Here is my assessment:
- The proposer has not provided any details about himself whatsoever and I cannot count "Shopper" as relevant experience here
- The proposer has been a member of Project Catalyst only since the 22nd of August, 2021
- I cannot find any previous contributions of the proposer to the Cardano ecosystem
- There are no details in the proposal about who will do what, when and how
- The budget is very large and there is no justification on how it is intended to be used
- Between 22 and 25 August, the proposer has created 7 separate proposals, all suffering from the same issues as this one. This leads me to suspect that the proposals were created en masse in the hopes of gaming the system and obtaining some funds. I apologize if I am wrong.
To make this proposal feasible, the proposer needs to provide more information about himself, about the people who will help him and as mentioned earlier, to identify a problem and matching solution pertaining to this challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
I cannot find any information at all that explains how the progress and success of the proposal would be tracked, if it were to be funded.
As such, I completely disagree that the proposal is auditable.
In order for this to be fixed, the proposer needs to provide a clear roadmap describing what will be done when and how, with specific milestones and a time-horizon for the implementation. Along with this, key progress indicators also have to be mentioned.

solution: フィアットからアデレードへのシームレスな移動が可能に。食料品や衣料品のオンライン注文と配送。  adaを格納するための割引特典。無料配送オプション。
